item.title: Jak nainstalovat LAMP (Apache, MySQL, PHP) v Arch Linuxu
item.description: LAMP je akronym Linux Apache MySQL a Php. V tomto tutoriálu si ukážeme, jak nainstalovat LAMP v Arch Linuxu.

item.title: Proč jsem přešel na Linux
item.description: Chci se tu podělit proč jsem vlastně z operačního systému Windows přešel na Linux.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 01-07
item.description: This is a modest re-write of chapters 1 - 7. None of the changes are “earth shattering,” but hopefully most of the typos, grammar mistakes, timeline errors, and implausible or unexplained science has been corrected.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 08 - Perils, Proposals, and Progeny
item.description: Homeland Security, US Navy, International Smuggling, and people who just love mermaids. The mers face new challenges and new mers.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 09 - Autopsies, Admirals, and Adversaries
item.description: New mers bond with their new pod-mates, the Connors finally make landfall and discover the changes and more, but they cannot stay, at least not all of them. The story continues.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 10 - Re-adjustments, Reprisals, and Revelations
item.description: Trevor and Rose finish their changes, Pat makes new discoveries about mermaid bodies, new potential mers arrive on Mermaid Island. The saga continues

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 11 - Babies, Beliefs, and By-Products
item.description: New mers, new babies, new challenges, a new transition, and new discoveries that make Mermaid Island a busy place.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 12 - SEALS, Surprises, and Steadfastness
item.description: Joy recruits an old friend to be a new mer, the Moon Pool itself changes, and the saga continues.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 13 – MAD-mers, CHEW, and Poly-mers
item.description: The saga continues, Pat and the scientists experiment with mer-bonds, the Connors return to Mermaid Island, Joy and Mac find a mole in Malaki’s organization, the mers learn more about their new bodies and capabilities, and Rose discovers a secret about their mer-organs.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 14 - Choosing Change
item.description: The epic tail (pun) of Mermaid Island continues. The mer scientists unlock the secret of the microorganisms, Abao attacks, Hank Connor and his crew transition to mers, Joy and Mac face uncertainties, and we learn more about the nature of mer-life.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 15 - Camouflage, Connections, and Chesapeake
item.description: The story picks up from where we last left off. Mac and Joy are unconscious, near death; the rescue team arrives in Davao searching for the Thompson’s mother; Trevor’s pod delivers the doomsday device and rescues some crash survivors; and another slice of paradise is revealed.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 16 - Science, Sons, and Sirens
item.description: Mac’s Pod on Taylor’s Island completes, the three “new” pods on Mermaid Island begin their changes, the world comes another step closer to discovering the mers.

item.title: Changes in Paradise: Part 17 - Waiting, Wondering, Worrying
item.description: Mers and soon-to-be-mers in both oceans wonder if their struggle for peace will be successful. The last of the rescued survivors begin their journeys as the Chesapeake mers make new discoveries and add new members. Will Malaki finally face justice? The saga continues!

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 18
item.description: “So, all I have to do is drink that stuff?” Miu asked. For someone who had been super before, the question felt utterly strange to anybody else in the room.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 17
item.description: Midnight was long-past but Miu didn’t feel tired at all. Her body was still filled to the brim with super energy and the dancing she had done so far may have been beyond the capabilities of humans, but not enough to actually put a hole into her energy supply.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 16
item.description:
“Are you sure you want to do this?” Michelle asked once more.

James rolled his eyes. “You know that I gave it some thought, after all you read them.”

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 15
item.description: Michelle bit her lip as she used her X-ray vision to keep track of the situation. After a fight with James she had visited her sister for some counseling about that - only to be disturbed by her sister’s girlfriend.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 14
item.description: Deziree turned around to spot a woman hovering there. She wore a black catsuit with red and orange flames on it that seemed to flow straight into the boots she wore.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 13
item.description: Michelle stared at the container, trying to process the events of the last hours.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 12
item.description: “You have got to be kidding me!” Prof. Christopher Harland didn’t even try to hide his disappointment.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 11
item.description:
“Dr. Thompson, do you have a minute?”

James turned around to face the woman who had addressed him. He already recognized her voice.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 10
item.description: James Thompson awoke from one of the strangest dreams he ever had and was immediately faced with the most likely reason for this. Michelle was still sound asleep, her lips curled to a smile that begged to be kissed.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 09
item.description: Fred stared at the open window of his hospital room as if he expected her. Amanda had silently watched his conversation with Erika, using her newfound super hearing to eavesdrop.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 08
item.description: Erika finished her drink while she calmly looked around the bar. Since it was Monday there weren’t many people there, making it harder for her to find a man to… relieve some stress.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 07
item.description: James got home and checked his calendar. Yes, today was Sunday. He didn’t feel like he had just spent a day off, which was a stark contrast to how his work had been before this weekend.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 06
item.description: The blonde woman hovered above the city trying to find an opportunity to put her superpowers to good use. It had been just over ten minutes since she left the parking block.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 05
item.description:
“I can’t believe you actually took it!”

Michelle’s first reaction to seeing her best friend Amanda with the body of a goddess hovering through her apartment window was different than either of them had expected it to be.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 04
item.description: “That was so awesome,” was the first thing Amanda said when they arrived back at Michelle’s place. “How you jumped out of this burning house, with this girl in your arms, descending to the ground like an angel.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 03
item.description: Amanda Steward was sure that she would never forget this day. This morning, she had found out that her boyfriend had been cheating on her for weeks; hours later, her best friend Michelle had shown her something so unbelievable, the young woman could barely put it into words. After drinking some strange liquid, Michelle’s plain body had transformed into that of a super sexy goddess.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 02
item.description: The morning sun had been shining into the apartment room for hours before its sole inhabitant finally decided to wake up.

item.title: Michelle's Meteor Memento Part 01
item.description: It was already dark, when Michelle Jenkins returned to her apartment. She was exhausted, the last weeks had taken a toll on her and she was really glad that the weekend had finally arrived.

item.title: Markdown Syntax
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
